pr_title: Convert ignore list storage to UUID-based

timeline.message: Convert ignore list storage to UUID-based
Use EssentialsUpgrade rather than on-the-fly conversion

timeline.bodyText: I'd prefer we stored actual UUID objects, not Strings representing them
timeline.author: mdcfe

replies.bodyText: Bit confused here: I'm pretty sure UUID::toString is already in a serializable format? You just use UUID::fromString to convert it back into a UUID object.
replies.author: pop4959

replies.bodyText: I mean I'd prefer we used the actual UUID type rather than masking it as a String - it's more obvious when reading source/method signatures that we're working with UUIDs as opposed to usernames.
replies.author: mdcfe

replies.bodyText: Oh OK I meant we're still using strings for storing in the userdata file, right? I might have just misunderstood what you said.
replies.author: pop4959
